sols_html:
We want to use the Ratio test, so we look at the limit:

\[\begin{aligned} \lim_{n\to \infty} \left|\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_{n}}\right|&=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{\frac{(2n+2)!}{((n+1)^2+1)((n+1)!)^2}}{\frac{(2n)!}{(n^2+1)(n!)^2}}\\ &=\lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(2n+2)!(n^2+1)(n!)^2}{(2n)!((n+1)^2+1)((n+1)!)^2}\\ &=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{(2n+2)!}{(2n)!}\cdot \frac{(n^2+1)}{(n+1)^2+1} \cdot (\frac{n!}{(n+1)!})^2\\ &=\lim_{n\to \infty}(2n+2)(2n+1)\cdot \frac{n^2+1}{n^2+2n+2}\cdot \frac{1}{(n+1)^2}\\ &=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{2n+2}{n+1}\cdot \frac{2n+1}{n+1}\cdot \frac{n^2+1}{n^2+2n+2}=2\cdot 2 \cdot 1=4\end{aligned}\]

Since this limit is \(>1\) we know that this series diverges.
sols_latex:
We want to use the Ratio test, so we look at the limit:

\begin{align*}
\lim_{n\to \infty}  \left|\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_{n}}\right|&=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{\frac{(2n+2)!}{((n+1)^2+1)((n+1)!)^2}}{\frac{(2n)!}{(n^2+1)(n!)^2}}\\
&=\lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{(2n+2)!(n^2+1)(n!)^2}{(2n)!((n+1)^2+1)((n+1)!)^2}\\
&=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{(2n+2)!}{(2n)!}\cdot \frac{(n^2+1)}{(n+1)^2+1} \cdot (\frac{n!}{(n+1)!})^2\\
&=\lim_{n\to \infty}(2n+2)(2n+1)\cdot \frac{n^2+1}{n^2+2n+2}\cdot \frac{1}{(n+1)^2}\\
&=\lim_{n\to \infty} \frac{2n+2}{n+1}\cdot \frac{2n+1}{n+1}\cdot \frac{n^2+1}{n^2+2n+2}=2\cdot 2 \cdot 1=4
\end{align*}

Since this limit is $>1$ we know that this series diverges.

statement_html:
Determine, with explanation, whether the series

\[\begin{aligned} \sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{n}(2n)!}{(n^{2}+1)(n!)^{2}}\end{aligned}\]

converges absolutely, converges conditionally, or diverges.
